title: System Workflows Policy
description: Constitutional schema for the policy defining mandatory and optional system workflows.

integration_workflow.description: The mandatory, sequential workflow for integrating code changes.

self_healing_routines.description: A catalog of standalone, on-demand maintenance commands.

id.description: A unique, dot-notation identifier for the step.

description.description: A human-readable explanation of the step's purpose.

continues_on_failure.description: If true, the workflow continues even if this step fails.
